meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the oophytic characteristics of the plant.
meanings.sent2: The oophytic nature of the organism fascinated the researchers.
meanings.sent3: The oophytic plant threw a party for all its egg-producing friends.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed in an oophytic manner, giving birth to new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with oophytic beauty, showcasing the unique egg-related features.

meanings.definition: A plant that reproduces by means of eggs.
meanings.sent1: The oophytic in the greenhouse was carefully nurtured by the botanist.
meanings.sent2: In the forest, you can find various oophytes growing naturally.
meanings.sent3: The oophytic surprised everyone by laying colorful eggs in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The field of oophytes resembled a garden of delicate egg-bearing plants.
meanings.sent5: Children marveled at the oophytic, imagining tiny eggs hatching into plants.
